articles.description: BHPian Omkar recently shared this with other enthusiasts. The last Formula 1 race in India was held in 2013! We've had to wait almost a decade to watch international-level racing live in our country. Not Formula 1, but this year fans finally got to see some w…
articles.content:
BHPian Omkar recently shared this with other enthusiasts.
